snippet: One of the biggest rider complaints, little screens would not be required in livery cabs taking street hails, under a city plan.
abstract: Miniature television screens will not be mandatory in back seats of the new livery cabs in New York City under preliminary plan expected to be unveiled in February by the Taxi and Limousine commission.
lead_paragraph: One of the biggest rider complaints, little screens would not be required in livery cabs taking street hails, under a city plan.

headline.seo: New N.Y.C. Livery Cabs Won’t Have to Have TVs
headline.main: New Liveries in New York With No TVs to Despise
headline.print_headline: New Liveries In New York With No TVs To Despise
